Litecoin has had it's first difficulty change since the halving at block 1681344. Difficulty dropped from 15930321 to 15234158, which is a 4.4% drop in difficulty/hashrate.  Note that this is not a full diff change period since the halving. Next diff change at block 1683360.

@BoilingPointLTC @ericbowman87 @NickLTC @ecurrencyhodler Changing difficulty change algorithm requires a hardfork. Litecoin being scrypt dominant doesn't need a fast algorithm. As we saw with this latest halving, the Litecoin network was barely affected.  Also, having a periodic diff change allows more predictable mining profitability.
